channel.title: Law Of Attraction - ThinkBanc AntonioThornton.com
channel.description: Have you seen The Secret? Are you new to The Law Of Attraction? Welcome to The ThinkBanc Podcast on Law Of Attraction and Psycho-Cybernetics.
channel.itunes:author: Antonio Thornton
channel.itunes:summary: Antonio Thornton reveals practical Law Of Attraction tips to show you how to create the life your desire. His 16 years of study and real-life experiences have you captivated,motivated and educated!
channel.itunes:subtitle: Discover A Practical Approach To USING THE Law Of Attraction.

item.title: Good News: Nothing Will Turn Out The Way You Want
item.description: Law of Attraction: Yes! It's GOOD news that nothing will turn out exactly the way you want it to... listen and find out why.
item.itunes:author: Antonio Thornton
item.itunes:summary: Law of Attraction: Yes! It's GOOD news that nothing will turn out exactly the way you want it to... listen and find out why.
item.itunes:subtitle: Law of Attraction

item.title: You Attract Who You Are
item.description:
The people you hang out with are usually a reflection of who you are and are being. Look at the the 5 closet people to you and you'll find that you're typically the average of the 5. If you aren't where you want to be in life, you may want to consider "upgrading" your friends.
http://www.antoniothornton.com/law-of-attraction/you-attract-who-you-are.html
item.itunes:author: Antonio Thornton
item.itunes:summary:
The people you hang out with are usually a reflection of who you are and are being. Look at the the 5 closet people to you and you'll find that you're typically the average of the 5. If you aren't where you want to be in life, you may want to consider "upgrading" your friends.
http://www.antoniothornton.com/law-of-attraction/you-attract-who-you-are.html

item.title: Something Bigger Than You
item.description:
When your life seems to be getting overwhelming, it's probably because you're too narrowly focused on what's going on.
Find something bigger than you to put things in perspective.
item.itunes:author: Antonio Thornton
item.itunes:summary:
When your life seems to be getting overwhelming, it's probably because you're too narrowly focused on what's going on.

item.title: How To Never Spend A Dime Again
item.description: A simple shift to never have to spend money again.

item.title: Does It Take Hard Work To Attract Money?
item.description: If you ask most people what they think it takes to make a lot of money and 99% of them will say hard work... is that true?
item.itunes:author: Antonio Thornton
item.itunes:summary: If you ask most people what they think it takes to make a lot of money and 99% of them will say hard work... is that true?

item.title: Cause And Effect - What You See Is...

item.title: Stop Doing That!
item.description: Hate washing dishes, cutting the grass, etc... well STOP DOING THAT! You're only attracting more frustration and headache by doing them. Not only that... you're robbing someone else of their joy.
item.itunes:author: Antonio Thornton
item.itunes:summary: Hate washing dishes, cutting the grass, etc... well STOP DOING THAT! You're only attracting more frustration and headache by doing them. Not only that... you're robbing someone else of their joy.

item.title: Law Of Attraction - Ask For What You Want
item.description:
More Law Of Attraction tips from Aria: Ask For What You Want! You just may get it....but you're almost guaranteed to NOT get what you want if you don't
We can learn a lot from a 1-year-old :-)

item.itunes:summary:

item.title: Attract More Wealth: Are You Happy About Your Bills?
item.description: If you're happy and you know it...pay your bills!! Clap! Clap! A great way to attract more wealth and prosperity... be happy about your bills. Here's an easy way to make that shift.

item.itunes:summary: If you're happy and you know it...pay your bills!! Clap! Clap! A great way to attract more wealth and prosperity... be happy about your bills. Here's an easy way to make that shift.

item.title: Attracting Wealth And The Zero Sum Game
item.description: Some people think that if you have more, they have to have less...and vice versa. That couldn't be further from the truth. If it were, we'd all be screwed. The universe is abundant and we can have whatever we want.

item.itunes:summary: Some people think that if you have more, they have to have less...and vice versa. That couldn't be further from the truth. If it were, we'd all be screwed. The universe is abundant and we can have whatever we want.
